verses.text: Then they \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against \w Keilah|strong="H7084"\w*, and they \w rob|strong="H8154"\w* the \w threshingfloors|strong="H1637"\w*.

Therefore \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w enquired|strong="H7592"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Shall I \w go|strong="H3212"\w* and \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* these \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*? And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, and \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, and \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w Keilah|strong="H7084"\w*.

And \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Behold, we be \w afraid|strong="H3373"\w* here in \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*: how much more then if we \w come|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Keilah|strong="H7084"\w* against the \w armies|strong="H4634"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*?

Then \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w enquired|strong="H7592"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* yet \w again|strong="H3254"\w*. And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* him and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to \w Keilah|strong="H7084"\w*; for I will \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* into thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

So \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and his \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Keilah|strong="H7084"\w*, and \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* with the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, and brought \w away|strong="H5090"\w* their \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* them with a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H4347"\w*. So \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w saved|strong="H3467"\w* the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Keilah|strong="H7084"\w*.

And it came to pass, when \w Abiathar|strong="H0054"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahimelech|strong="H0288"\w* \w fled|strong="H1272"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w* to \w Keilah|strong="H7084"\w*, \add that\add* he came \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \add with\add* an \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

¶ And it was \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* that \w David|strong="H1732"\w* was \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Keilah|strong="H7084"\w*. And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w delivered|strong="H5234"\w* him into mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*; for he is shut \w in|strong="H5462"\w*, by \w entering|strong="H0935"\w* into a \w town|strong="H5892"\w* that hath \w gates|strong="H1817"\w* and \w bars|strong="H1280"\w*.

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w called|strong="H8085"\w* all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w together|strong="H8085"\w* to \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, to go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to \w Keilah|strong="H7084"\w*, to \w besiege|strong="H6696"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and his \w men|strong="H0582"\w*.

¶ And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* that \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* secretly \w practised|strong="H2790"\w* \w mischief|strong="H7451"\w* against him; and he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Abiathar|strong="H0054"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, Bring \w hither|strong="H5066"\w* the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* hath \w certainly|strong="H8085"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w seeketh|strong="H1245"\w* to \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Keilah|strong="H7084"\w*, to \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* for my sake.

Will the \w men|strong="H1167"\w* of \w Keilah|strong="H7084"\w* deliver me \w up|strong="H5462"\w* into his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*? will \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* come \w down|strong="H3381"\w*, as thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* hath \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*? O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, I beseech thee, \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*. And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, He will come \w down|strong="H3381"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, Will the \w men|strong="H1167"\w* of \w Keilah|strong="H7084"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5462"\w* me and my \w men|strong="H0582"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*? And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, They will deliver \add thee\add* \w up|strong="H5462"\w*.\f + \fr 23.12 \ft deliver: Heb. shut up\f*

¶ Then \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and his \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, \add which were\add* about \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*, \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* and \w departed|strong="H3318"\w* out of \w Keilah|strong="H7084"\w*, and \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w whithersoever|strong="H0834"\w* they could \w go|strong="H1980"\w*. And it was \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* that \w David|strong="H1732"\w* was \w escaped|strong="H4422"\w* from \w Keilah|strong="H7084"\w*; and he \w forbare|strong="H2308"\w* to go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w abode|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* in strong \w holds|strong="H4679"\w*, and \w remained|strong="H3427"\w* in a \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Ziph|strong="H2128"\w*. And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* him every \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, but \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* him not into his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* was come \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* his \w life|strong="H5315"\w*: and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \add was\add* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Ziph|strong="H2128"\w* in a \w wood|strong="H2793"\w*.

¶ And \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w Saul’s|strong="H7586"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w* into the \w wood|strong="H2793"\w*, and \w strengthened|strong="H2388"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* in \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* not: for the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* shall not \w find|strong="H4672"\w* thee; and thou shalt be \w king|strong="H4427"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and I shall be \w next|strong="H4932"\w* unto thee; and that also \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w*.

And they \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w abode|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w wood|strong="H2793"\w*, and \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* to his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

¶ Then came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* the \w Ziphites|strong="H2130"\w* to \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* to \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Doth not \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* himself with us in strong \w holds|strong="H4679"\w* in the \w wood|strong="H2793"\w*, in the \w hill|strong="H1389"\w* of \w Hachilah|strong="H2444"\w*, which \add is\add* on the \w south|strong="H3225"\w* of \w Jeshimon|strong="H3452"\w*?\f + \fr 23.19 \ft on…: Heb. on the right hand\f*\f + \fr 23.19 \ft Jeshimon: or, the wilderness\f*

Now therefore, O \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, come \w down|strong="H3381"\w* according to all the \w desire|strong="H0185"\w* of thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* to come \w down|strong="H3381"\w*; and our part \add shall be\add* to \w deliver|strong="H5462"\w* him into the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.
And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* ye of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; for ye have \w compassion|strong="H2550"\w* on me.

\w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, I pray you, \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* yet, and \w know|strong="H3045"\w* and \w see|strong="H7200"\w* his \w place|strong="H4725"\w* where his \w haunt|strong="H7272"\w* is, \add and\add* who hath \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* him there: for it is \w told|strong="H0559"\w* me \add that\add* he dealeth \w very|strong="H6191"\w* \w subtilly|strong="H6191"\w*.\f + \fr 23.22 \ft haunt…: Heb. foot shall be\f*

\w See|strong="H7200"\w* therefore, and take \w knowledge|strong="H3045"\w* of all the lurking \w places|strong="H4224"\w* where he \w hideth|strong="H2244"\w* himself, and come ye \w again|strong="H7725"\w* to me with the \w certainty|strong="H3559"\w*, and I will \w go|strong="H1980"\w* with you: and it shall come to pass, if he \w be|strong="H3426"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, that I will \w search|strong="H2664"\w* him out throughout all the \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

And they \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Ziph|strong="H2128"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*: but \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and his \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \add were\add* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Maon|strong="H4584"\w*, in the \w plain|strong="H6160"\w* on the \w south|strong="H3225"\w* of \w Jeshimon|strong="H3452"\w*.

\w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* also and his \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \add him\add*. And they \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*: wherefore he came \w down|strong="H3381"\w* into a \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*, and \w abode|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Maon|strong="H4584"\w*. And when \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add that\add*, he \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Maon|strong="H4584"\w*.\f + \fr 23.25 \ft into…: or, from the rock\f*

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* on this \w side|strong="H6654"\w* of the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and his \w men|strong="H0582"\w* on that \w side|strong="H6654"\w* of the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*: and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* made \w haste|strong="H2648"\w* to get \w away|strong="H3212"\w* for \w fear|strong="H6440"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*; for \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* and his \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w compassed|strong="H5849"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and his \w men|strong="H0582"\w* round \w about|strong="H5849"\w* to \w take|strong="H8610"\w* them.

¶ But there \w came|strong="H0935"\w* a \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* unto \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Haste|strong="H4116"\w* thee, and \w come|strong="H3212"\w*; for the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* have \w invaded|strong="H6584"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 23.27 \ft invaded…: Heb. spread themselves upon, etc\f*

Wherefore \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* from \w pursuing|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w against|strong="H7125"\w* the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*: therefore they \w called|strong="H7121"\w* that \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w Sela-hammahlekoth|strong="H5555"\w*.\f + \fr 23.28 \ft Sela-hammahlekoth: that is, The rock of divisions\f*
¶ And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from thence, and \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in strong \w holds|strong="H4679"\w* at \w En-gedi|strong="H5872"\w*.
